column3: Lord, help me to know you more and to know your purpose in my life.  Please fulfill it for Your glory
Lord, please protect my family from any sickness, specially from COVID-19.  Thank You Lord
Lord, please provide financially so that we can have our own Church Building that is safe from flood in times of typhoon.
Lord, help our leaders to decide based on what is right.  Please guide their decisions.  And use people so that they can know You
